snippet: An Oliver Award-winning play makes its way to New York from London, with its considered and blunt title intact.
abstract: Mike Bartlett begins Off Broadway previews of his play ---- (The Cockfight Play); Oliver Award-winning play makes its way to New York from London, with its considered and blunt title intact. Photos (M)
lead_paragraph: London LATE in 2009 Mike Bartlett opened his third play at the Royal Court Theater here, where it sold out its entire run before the first preview and went on to win an Olivier Award the next March. The same play is now in previews Off Broadway for its American premiere, with a different cast but with the London creative team on board.

headline.main: The Playwright Who Chose That Title
